rotate_head.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to adjust the direction of the light.

slide_translation_bar.description: Slide the translation bar of the lamp to adjust the height of the lamp.

rotate_rotation_bar.description: Rotate the rotation bar of the lamp to adjust the orientation of the lamp arm.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the base of the lamp to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the head, translation bar, rotation bar, and base.
